original: Noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noganthaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: nogantham dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā nogantham dhamma

original: paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho
analyzed: paṭicca na noganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā nogantham dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ

original: ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nanoganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoganthaṁ
analyzed: nanogantham dhammam paṭicca nanoganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na nogantham dhammam paṭicca

original: nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: noganthaḥ ca na noganthaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: nogantham ca na nogantham ca dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: nogantham ca na nogantham ca dhammam paṭicca na noganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: nogantham ca na nogantham ca dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ ca na noganthaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
